Monologue.Original: “It is not safe here.{Line} Please, let’s go.”

Monologue.Current: “Heh heh heh.{Line} This should be interesting.”
Monologue.Original: “Heh heh heh.{Line} This should be interesting.”

Monologue.Current: “I’m not training everyday{Line} for nothing. Come on!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“You’ll have to get{Line} past me first.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Another one of Cid’s followers!? DIE!”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“He’s not here, either.{Line} Slippery bastard.”
